name: Concussion Standalone
description:
With the fast-approaching death of Flash, I figured that as one final tribute to my last flash game, I'd make it an .exe for anyone still playing it to enjoy. Let me specify that you do NOT need to install any additional software for this game to work. That's the whole point.

Boring Stuff

My website: http://gmrgames.com/

My Patreon: http://patreon.com/gmr

Original game:

 http://www.stickpage.com/concussiongame.shtml

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/680079

(I'd prefer you use the Newgrounds link because it generates a tiny amount of ad revenue)
